meta.label: Text Summarization
meta.description: Summarize texts using extractive summarization methods (which means that the summary will be a number of extracted sentences from the original text). ⚠️ This plugin is now "deprecated", we recommend using the [Generative AI](https://doc.dataiku.com/dss/latest/generative-ai/index.html) feature.
meta.author: Dataiku (Hicham El Boukkouri)
